TITLE: Episode 32 - Black Lesbians' Guns Matter
DESCRIPTION: Since Maddie is busy being a slave to evil capitalist pigs, Kim from “Lesbertarian” sits down with Jessie to talk recent politics. They talk guns, MLK day and the Virginia protest.  The conversation takes many twists and turns but one thing is for sure. We all should own guns.
